puzzle.help: 1. On the board there are a few nails. Each one nails a plank to the board. 2. Planks are 3 tiles long and can be oriented vertically or horizontally. The Nail can be in any of the 3 tiles. 3. Each Plank touches orthogonally exactly two other Planks. 4. All the Planks form a ring, or a closed loop.
